nodes.text: Jerg was a Human male smuggler who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. His ship was called the Cyclops.

Around 11 BBY, he made a blind jump through hyperspace to escape Imperial Star Destroyers, and as a result rediscovered Ruusan. Ten years later, he helped Morgan Katarn replant Rebel colonists from Sulon onto Ruusan at his base of operations, Fort Nowhere. He was offworld for thirty days when the Battle of Fort Nowhere began.
Jerg was known to walk around barefoot, and to wear a captain's hat from the time of the Galactic Republic. He was rumored to have been physically involved with his second-in-command, Marie Peeno.
In the audio adaptation of Dark Forces: Rebel Agent, he was voiced by Tom Keith.
